data.lyric:
[ti:c l o s e (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:The Off-Season (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]c l o s e (Explicit) - J. Cole
[00:00.95]Lyrics by：J. Cole
[00:01.91]Composed by：J. Cole
[00:02.87]Yeah
[00:03.36]
[00:06.23]Close
[00:06.54]
[00:10.97]Ville-matic one one
[00:13.51]One one one-two one
[00:15.93]One-two one one-two one
[00:18.26]
[00:18.78]One-two one one listen
[00:21.04]
[00:21.74]Close I stare at my dreams as they approach
[00:24.40]Gotta be patient and trust in God He the coach
[00:26.86]Temptations are taking a shortcut but I don't
[00:29.55]'Cause I ain't tryna be a almost when I get it I'ma float
[00:32.70]
[00:33.28]Gone are the days we was close
[00:34.98]Now when I see you I look at you just like a ghost
[00:37.46]A shell of your former self so caught up with that d**e
[00:40.11]Two n***as singin' two different notes and you know I gotta coast
[00:43.82]Nothin' but a dollar and some hope
[00:45.68]Up in NY but d**n what hurts me the most
[00:48.44]You was a good n***a we knew each other's folks
[00:50.79]Now you gotta ride around with the toast
[00:52.84]And you keep that s**t close
[00:54.31]'Cause n***as plottin' on you since you chose
[00:56.20]To roll around with the candy paint on spokes
[00:59.08]You know 'Ville n***as don't like it when you boast
[01:01.69]You know twelve be takin' notes and they watchin' you close
[01:04.94]But maybe you don't see 'em 'cause the smoke
[01:06.97]Cloudin' your vision from every cigar that you toke
[01:09.67]Plus the lean you sippin' which started as a joke
[01:11.97]Got you now fiendin' for your next dose meanwhile I'm so close
[01:15.47]Don't even give a f**k that I'm broke
[01:17.61]'Cause in my mind I'm rich with s**t I done wrote
[01:20.32]Therefore I'm convinced that this is supposed to happen
[01:23.46]And in time I'ma blow they gon' label me the GOAT
[01:26.30]How long has it been since we spoke
[01:28.33]Last night I jumped up from my sleep I was soaked
[01:31.04]Call it a nightmare the scene that awoke me
[01:33.59]Involved you and n***as I ain't know
[01:35.45]They was creepin' up close
[01:36.92]I saw the heat tucked in they coats
[01:39.00]You didn't notice 'cause you was busy countin' dough
[01:41.65]I tried to yell but nothin' came out of my throat
[01:44.06]N***as cocked back the hammers and you froze
[01:45.98]In your eyes I saw hope
[01:47.64]Hope of a better way to cope with the pain
[01:50.15]And the scars than the lean and the coke
[01:52.23]And I swear in that moment I wish we were still close
[01:54.82]Maybe I could've saved you but no trigger squeeze gun smoke
[01:58.26]I open up my eyes with a jolt
[02:00.22]Heart pumpin' like Usain Bolt
[02:02.38]Reached for my phone missed calls and a text message note
[02:05.31]From my mama sayin' you just got smoked d**n this life is no joke
[02:09.00]
[02:10.86]Close
[02:11.31]
[02:13.42]F**k
data.trans:
[ti:c l o s e (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:The Off-Season (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.95]//
[00:01.91]//
[00:02.87]//
[00:03.36]
[00:06.23]挚友
[00:06.54]
[00:10.97]Ville-matic 一 一
[00:13.51]一 一 一二 一
[00:15.93]一二 一 一二 一
[00:18.26]
[00:18.78]一二 一 一 听着
[00:21.04]
[00:21.74]近在咫尺 我看着我的梦想朝我靠近
[00:24.40]必须保持耐心 相信上帝 他是教练
[00:26.86]诱惑让我去走捷径 但我没有上套
[00:29.55]因为我并不会只是差不多就满足 等我成功之后 我要遨游空中
[00:32.70]
[00:33.28]我们亲密无间的那些日子已经远去
[00:34.98]现在一见到你 你在我眼里就像个鬼影
[00:37.46]从前的你的躯壳 被那麻痹神经的东西困住
[00:40.11]两个人唱着不同的音符 你知道我渴望一帆风顺的日子
[00:43.82]除了一美元和一点希望 什么也没有
[00:45.68]一路去到纽约 但是可恶 是谁伤我最深
[00:48.44]你是个好人 我们认识彼此的亲朋
[00:50.79]现在你端着酒杯到处祝酒
[00:52.84]而且你酒不离手
[00:54.31]因为那些人早想对你下手 从你选择
[00:56.20]跟只会甜言蜜语的朋友鬼混
[00:59.08]你知道这里的人不喜欢听你吹牛
[01:01.69]你知道十二个人盯上了你 他们看着你靠近
[01:04.94]但或许因为缭绕的烟雾 你没有看见他们的身影
[01:06.97]你抽的每一支雪茄都会遮蔽你的眼睛
[01:09.67]而且你现在丢不开的酒 一开始就是个笑话
[01:11.97]让你此刻为下一支药剂疯狂不已 而与此同时 我就在你身边看着你
[01:15.47]我根本不在乎我是不是会失败
[01:17.61]因为在我的概念里 我写的歌让我足够富裕
[01:20.32]所以我相信这有可能会发生
[01:23.46]等我大红大紫 他们会给我贴上标签说我是史上第一
[01:26.30]我们已经多久没有聊天
[01:28.33]昨晚我从睡梦中惊醒 浑身湿透
[01:31.04]我做了噩梦 那画面吓醒了我
[01:33.59]里面有你还有一些我不认识的家伙
[01:35.45]他们鬼鬼祟祟地靠近
[01:36.92]我看见他们来势汹汹
[01:39.00]你没有注意到 因为你正忙着数钱
[01:41.65]我想要大喊 但喉咙里一点声音都发不出
[01:44.06]那些家伙举起了铁锤 你愣在了原地
[01:45.98]在你的眼中我看见了渴求
[01:47.64]渴求能有更好的办法应对痛苦和伤疤
[01:50.15]能够不沉湎于烟酒
[01:52.23]我发誓在那一刻 我希望我们依然亲近
[01:54.82]或许我就能拯救你 但是不 扳机已经扣紧 枪口冒出了青烟
[01:58.26]我猛地睁开眼睛
[02:00.22]心跟Usain Bolt的一样剧烈跳动
[02:02.38]拿起我的手机 很多未接来电还有一条醒目的短信
[02:05.31]妈妈发给我告诉我你的死讯 该死 这生活可真不是玩笑
[02:09.00]
[02:10.86]挚友
[02:11.31]
[02:13.42]//
